thread.title: School shooting in French town of Grasse sparks terror alert
thread.title_full: School shooting in French town of Grasse sparks terror alert

author: Reuters
title: School shooting in French town of Grasse sparks terror alert
text:
School shooting in French town of Grasse sparks terror alert 
Reports said a man in possession of several weapons opened fire on the headmaster. French TV channel BFMTV reports several wounded in shooting in Grasse. Photograph: The Guardian View more sharing options   12.28 GMT Last modified on   12.36 GMT 
France has issued a terror attack warning after a shooting at a school in the southern town of Grasse. 
Reports said a man in possession of several weapons opened fire on the headmaster at the Alexis de Tocqueville school in the town. 
Police said one man had been arrested and a second person was possibly on the run. 
Residents have been advised to stay inside. The French government launched its mobile telephone application warning of a “terrorist” attack. Ministère Intérieur (@Place_Beauvau) #Grasse Événement de sécurité publique en cours au lycée Alexis de #Tocqueville . Merci de suivre les consignes des autorités locales. pic.twitter.com/JTP62hmtG4
